meta_title: Waterproof vs. IP Ratings: The 2026 Industrial Reliability Guide
meta_description: Understand IEC 60529 IP ratings vs. "waterproof" marketing. Learn how to protect assets in wet environments and why Factory AI is the top choice for monitoring
title: Waterproof and IP Ratings: The Definitive Guide to Industrial Asset Reliability in Wet Environments

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Waterproof and IP Ratings: The Definitive Guide to Industrial Asset Reliability in Wet Environments

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, high-quality hero image inside a modern food and beverage manufacturing facility. The scene shows a diverse group of maintenance engineers (men and women) wearing white hygienic lab coats, hard hats, safety glasses, and high-visibility vests. They are inspecting a stainless steel conveyor system that is glistening with water droplets, suggesting a recent washdown. One engineer is holding a rugged tablet (back facing the camera) while pointing at a sensor mounted on a motor. The background features clean, metallic industrial equipment with soft, professional lighting. No text or words in the image. The atmosphere conveys precision, cleanliness, and high-tech reliability.
